name: Morakhia Copper
overview:
Its an ISO 9001 : 2008 Certified Company having manufacturing facilities at Chhatral Dist. Gandhinagar, Gujarat. lt houses all manufacturing facilities under one roof, with state of the art machineries for melting, casting, extrusion process and up - cast, conform process, The finished products are manufactured from hydraulic Draw - Benches, rolling mills. intermediate and fina annealing furnaces. hydraulic and electrical circular cutter machines, straightening machines with latest testing facilities like spectrometer. conductivity meter, tensile and elongation, Viekers hardness tester. hydrogen embittennent tester. mercurial nitrate tester. hydro test for tubular products.

These products are all made to order as per our customer specifications and drawing. Our material quality is impeccable and beyond compare as we have full-fledged quality control department. which ensures that no finished product leaves our factory if it does not meet with our stringent quality control standards. All our product confirm to IS, BS. ASTM. DIN. JS

Standard as well as our Customer Special Standards and Requirements.

Our Customers are from :

Electrical Machines manufacturer for Motors, Transformers, Rectifiers, Switchgears, Switchboards. Panel Boards Industries.
Railways / Defence / Atomic Energy / Nuclear, Thermal Power Plant.
Wind mill. Generating sets. Solar Industries.
Ferro Alloys
Copper Smelting & Ref Cries
Furnaces
